subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:

Goateed man sought in abduction
Police seek a young, goateed man videotaped leaving a Target store moments before the apparent abduction of an 18-year-old woman.

10. Therapists become bad guys on 'Sopranos'




 
















Calamari anyone?
Hundreds of jumbo squid have shown up on the California coast. KCAL's Amy Johnson reports.
